Articles.Content:
Firstly, This poll is inspired by the debate occurring here.

Secondly, I am aware that there have been previous polls of this topic, but, the last was a decent time ago, and over time our userbase will develop and change.

So please vote your age so we can have accurate data of our userbase's age.

EDIT: Please note that your username will not be displayed in the poll.

Edited August 8, 2013 by TheTriniFlyer
Oh goodie! Another one of these, pointless, useless discussions! I doesn't matter how long ago the last one was, they contribute nothing to the community.

Ehm... There's no poll.

Sorry, I'm only allowed to create the poll after the thread has been created.

Edited August 8, 2013 by TheTriniFlyer

Oh goodie! Another one of these, pointless, useless discussions! I doesn't matter how long ago the last one was, they contribute nothing to the community.

Well, this is the general discussion forum. This discussion seems pretty general to me.
Didn't we do this a month ago?

I see no debates there. Also, I don't see Sir Debates-A Lot(s) on that thread.

And for OP, your question has been already answered*. Twice.

*Justified in this case, since the latter thread was already completely lost and forgotten. Also, it's already a year and 8 months old, so a result shift, depending on how you've grouped it, is inevitable.

Edited August 8, 2013 by Flixxbeatz
Obligatory TV Tropes Life Ruination Warning.
Fortunately, my age hasn't changed enough since the last poll to bump me into a new category. That's good, because there's only two left...

Didn't we do this a month ago?
I see no debates there. Also, I don't see Sir Debates-A Lot(s) on that thread.

And for OP, your question has been already answered. Twice.

Please read this: "Secondly, I am aware that there have been previous polls of this topic, but, the last was a decent time ago, and over time our userbase will develop and change."
It's cool you are trying to spark off a thread that could involve the whole community TheTriniFlyer, but we're starting to see this topic+poll once a month now.

Please read this: "Secondly, I am aware that there have been previous polls of this topic, but, the last was a decent time ago, and over time our userbase will develop and change."

The age groupings probably haven't changed in one or two months. The old data is entirely relevant. Try again in a year.

It's cool you are trying to spark off a thread that could involve the whole community TheTriniFlyer, but we're starting to see this topic+poll once a month now.

Sorry, I just wanted to bring a sourced answer to the "Is KSP for Older Users" Thread.

But, before anything sparks too largely, Everyone, We Do NOT want a Community War/Riot! Please Keep any and all Discussion Civilized, Please.

Edited August 8, 2013 by TheTriniFlyer

The age groupings probably haven't changed in one or two months. The old data is entirely relevant. Try again in a year.

Well, Its just that I thought, maybe, with the Recent Steam Sale some new KSP'ers could have joined...

Fortunately, my age hasn't changed enough since the last poll to bump me into a new category. That's good, because there's only two left...

Well at least I know I'm not alone in that respect!

Sorry, I just wanted to bring a sourced answer to the "Is KSP for Older Users" Thread.

But, before anything sparks too largely, Everyone, We Do NOT want a Community War/Riot! Please Keep any and all Discussion Civilized, Please.

How could you start a war off of a poll on age?

Didn't we do this a month ago?

Yes. But apparently we have to discuss MechJeb and it's implications for the manhood of the user once a week now, so I guess we can suffer an age poll once a month.

Yes. But apparently we have to discuss MechJeb and it's implications for the manhood of the user once a week now, so I guess we can suffer an age poll once a month.

Your logic is impeccable, I concede.

How could you start a war off of a poll on age?

Welcome to the Internet!

My age has not changed since the last poll, but my "Playing KSP" state has. I didn't even know about the game 2 months ago.
